英文品名: WINNING STRESS FORMULA WITH ZINC TABLETS
適應症: 發育不良、營養補給、虛弱體質、熱性消耗性疾患之補助治療、妊娠婦之營養補給
主成分略述: NIACINAMIDE (NICOTINAMIDE), THIAMINE (VITAMIN B1), RIBOFLAVIN (VIT B2), PYRIDOXINE(VITAMIN B6), CYANOCOBALAMIN (VIT B12), FOLIC ACID, PANTOTHENATE (D- CALCIUM), ASCORBIC ACID (VIT C), TOCOPHEROL (ACETATE ALPHA DL- ), CUPRIC OXIDE, ZINC (ZINC SULFATE)
申請商地址: 台北縣三重巿大同北路６０巷２１號
